Package com.sinch.xms

Class SinchSMSApi

java.lang.Object
com.sinch.xms.SinchSMSApi
public final class SinchSMSApi
extends Object
A collection of convenient static methods for building XMS objects. Each method here will return a fresh builder producing the type of XMS object indicated by the method name.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SinchSMSApi()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static AutoUpdate.Builder autoUpdate()
    Returns a freshly created builder of auto update definitions.
    static MtBatchBinarySmsCreate.Builder batchBinarySms()
    Returns a freshly created batch SMS builder for binary messages.
    static MtBatchBinarySmsUpdate.Builder batchBinarySmsUpdate()
    Returns a freshly created builder for binary message updates.
    static BatchDeliveryReportParams.Builder batchDeliveryReportParams()
    Returns a freshly created batch delivery report parameter builder.
    static BatchFilter.Builder batchFilter()
    Returns a freshly created builder of batch filters.
    static MtBatchTextSmsCreate.Builder batchTextSms()
    Returns a freshly created batch SMS builder for text messages.
    static MtBatchTextSmsUpdate.Builder batchTextSmsUpdate()
    Returns a freshly created builder for text message updates.
    static GroupCreate.Builder groupCreate()
    Returns a freshly created builder of groups.
    static GroupFilter.Builder groupFilter()
    Returns a freshly created builder of group filters.
    static GroupUpdate.Builder groupUpdate()
    Returns a freshly created builder of group updates.
    static InboundsFilter.Builder inboundsFilter()
    Returns a freshly created builder of inbound message filters.
    static ParameterValues.Builder parameterValues()
    Returns a freshly created builder of text message parameter substitutions.
    static TagsUpdate.Builder tagsUpdate()
    Returns a freshly created tags update builder.
